description: An application made to court for judicial decision.  May be standalone or linked to a case

courtApplicationCases.description: The cases that are linked to this application

parentApplicationId.description: The identifier of the linked parent application.  Linked applications are a single level deep

courtOrder.description: When the application is in relation to a court order e.g. breach proceedings, the details of the court order

type.description: The type of application made to court for judicial decision.  Taken from reference data

applicationReceivedDate.description: The date that the application was received by HMCTS

applicationExternalCreatorType.description: Describes the generic role of the creator of the application in the HMCTS process (Prosecutor)

allegationOrComplaintStartDate.description: The date that the allegation or complaint is alleged to have started

allegationOrComplaintEndDate.description: The date that the allegation or complaint is alleged to have ended

applicationReference.description: The human readable reference for the application.  For linked applications this will be the case urn or the prosecution authority reference suffixed with a numerical sequence.  This is generated by the backend APIs and therefore is set optional, however a reference is required by the time the application is listed

applicant.description: The party applying to court to make a judicial decision on a matter

respondents.description: The parties answering to a matter before the court

thirdParties.description: The 3rd parties assocaited to the court matter.  Required to be notified

subject.description: The party that is the subject of teh application.  The subject is also a respondent or an applicant and is the subject of any orders and directions that are made during court proceedings

applicationParticulars.description: The particulars of the application when not covered by the associated document

courtApplicationPayment.description: The details of payment or fee exemption for the application

applicationDecisionSoughtByDate.description: The date by which a judicial decision is sought

applicationStatus.description: Indicates if the application is draft, listed or finalised

outOfTimeReasons.description: The rationale for seeking a judicial decision when the regulatory timeline has surpassed.  This only applies to application types that are time constrained i.e. isTimeRestricted == true

defendantASN.description: When the application is for breach proceedings the ASN for the breach proceedings is required by Bichard 7 and therefore is captured as part of the application.  The ASN applies to the subject of the application
